description: This veggie lasagne is light but packed with flavour and 5 different greens.
name: Green Vegetable Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large zucchini, thinly sliced into half moons
1 head broccoli, florets chopped, stalk grated

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Heat the oil in a large saucepan on a medium high heat. Add the leeks, garlic, zucchini, grated broccoli stalk and florets, spinach and kale and cook for 5 minutes to soften, stirring occasionally.

Tip in the flour, stir well to coat and cook for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the milk and simmer for 2-3 minutes to thicken. Add 50g of grated cheddar and mix well. Stir in the nutmeg and season with cracked black pepper to taste.

Add one quarter of the vegetable mix to the base of a baking dish, top with lasagne sheets and repeat until all the sauce has been added. Finish with a layer of lasagne sheets. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top.
Cover the dish with foil and bake for 30 minutes, remove the foil and bake for 10 more minutes until bubbling and golden on top.
